rules.title: Verify Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient initiates contact for an appointment.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or an established patient.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Status & Info
rules.condition: Patient provides their new/established status and/or identifying information.
rules.action: Confirm receipt and understanding of the provided information.
rules.example: Thank you, I see you're an established patient.

rules.title: Request ID for Established
rules.condition: Patient confirms they are an established patient.
rules.action: Request identifying details (e.g., phone number, date of birth) to locate their patient chart.
rules.example: Great, could I please get your phone number or date of birth to pull up your chart?

rules.title: Inform Chart Retrieval
rules.condition: After receiving identifying information from an established patient.
rules.action: Inform the patient that their chart is being retrieved and ask them to wait briefly.
rules.example: Thank you. I'm pulling up your chart now, please bear with me for a moment.

rules.title: Confirm Existing Provider/Location
rules.condition: An established patient's chart has been successfully located.
rules.action: Confirm the patient's usual provider and preferred location from their chart.
rules.example: And just to confirm, you usually see Dr. Smith at our downtown clinic, correct?

rules.title: Verify Chart Details
rules.condition: Patient's chart is open and the desired appointment type has been clarified.
rules.action: Confirm key patient details (e.g., address, insurance information) from the chart with the patient.
rules.example: Before we schedule, can I confirm your current address on file is 123 Main St.?

rules.title: Clarify Appointment Type
rules.condition: Patient expresses interest in scheduling an appointment.
rules.action: Ask what type of appointment the patient is seeking.
rules.example: What type of appointment are you looking to schedule today? Is it for a general check-up, a follow-up, or something else?

rules.title: Inquire General Patient Availability
rules.condition: After the patient's desired appointment type, preferred provider, and location have been clarified or confirmed.
rules.action: Ask the patient about their general availability preferences (e.g., preferred days of the week, times of day, or specific date ranges).
rules.example: To help me find the best time for you, what days or times generally work best for your schedule for this check-up?

rules.title: Search for Specific Appointment Slots
rules.condition: When the patient has provided specific desired days and/or times for an appointment with a confirmed provider and location.
rules.action: Access the scheduling system to search for available appointment slots that match the patient's specific requests.
rules.example: Okay, you're looking for Dr. Smith on a Tuesday afternoon at the downtown clinic. Let me check what's available.
